Block.Text: {C1}{Char:1016}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:1002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:1002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:1002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:1002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:1002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30} o exercito de {Name2}{C1}invadiu {Area}{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}|02,cc{C1}! nós temos que pegar nosso castelo de volta!{End}
{C1}{Char:0010}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}hmm?,um de seus castelos foi tomado, você vai abandona-lo?{End}
{C1}{Char:0012}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}That which is taken by force must be reclaimed.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}???{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}o reino de {Color:31}Aurora{Color:33}{End}
{C1}{Char:0000}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:33}Hmm... {End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:34}Ahh!{End}
{C1}{Char:0034}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}então, esse é o novo lorde de {Color:31}Aurora{Color:33}?{End}
{C1}{Char:0036}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Hmm... ei! aquilo é um {Color:31}Eevee{Color:33}?!{End}
{C1}{Char:0035}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}não é um pokemon que vemos todos os dias...{Wait:30}20 Hmm?{End}
{C1}{Char:0000}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}...?!{End}
{C1}{Char:0058}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}ei você!{Wait:30}20 você é {Name}{C1}, certo?,o novo lorde de {Color:31}Aurora{Color:33}?{End}
{C1}{Char:0066}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}nós somos de {Color:30}Ignis{Color:33}. um reino logo ali...{End}
{C1}{Char:0058}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}e nós vimos desafiar você a uma batalha !{End}
{C1}{Char:0000}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}...!{End}
{C1}{Char:0058}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}ha!, só tem um de você , isso vai ser muito fácil!{End}
{C1}{Char:0066}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}{Color:31}Aurora{Color:33} vai ser nossa!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:33}por vafor espere!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:33}eu lutarei ao seu lado!{End}
{C1}{Char:0058}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}...?!{End}
{C1}{Char:0066}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}bom, quanto mas melhor...{End}
{C1}{Char:0058}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}unam-se , se quiserem!,isso não vai fazer diferença! {End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Iessa é sua primeira batalha, |02,cc{C1}?{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Por favor deie me ajudar!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Ok,primeiro de tudo: movimento!, assim: , viu?{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}certo, agora é sua vez |02,cc{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}aperte o botão {Color:32}A{Color:33} para selecionar {Color:31}Eevee{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}⅚ mostre onde {Color:31}Eevee{Color:33} pode ir.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Use o {Color:32}direcional{Color:33} para selecionar aonde você quer se mover, entâo aperte o botâo {Color:32}A{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Vamos tentar se mover até ali.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:34}nâo aqui, |02,cc{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Selecione ⅔ esperar para encerrar sua vez.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:33}você não está perto o bastante para {Color:32}lutar{Color:33}, |02,cc{C1}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0058}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}bom, eu me sinto mal por você, tendo acabadodese tornar umlorde e tal...{End}
{C1}{Char:0058}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}mas você vai ter que sair do castelo de {Color:31}Aurora{Color:33} antes mesmo de se instalar!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:33}se essas pessoas tomarem , {Color:31}Aurora{Color:33} vái...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:33}ok deixe isso comigo!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:33}você pode cuidar daquele, |02,cc{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Movasse para um quadrado que seja adjacente ao doseu inimigo.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:34}não aqui, |02,cc{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}por favor selecione ⅓.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:33}agora é a hora, |02,cc{C1}! você tem que {Color:32}lutar{Color:33}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:33}você não pode pereder essa oportunidade! agora é a hora de {Color:32}lutar{Color:33}, |02,cc{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}selecione em que direçao atacar.{End}
{C1}{Char:0058}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}V-você é forte!,mais forte do que els falaram...{End}
{C1}{Char:0066}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}o que nós vamos fazer agora?! Lorde {Color:30}Hideyoshi{Color:33} va ficar furioso...{End}
{C1}{Char:0058}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Nâo importa!,vamos sair daqui!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:34}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:34}sua {Color:32}ligação{Color:33} com {Color:31}Eevee{Color:33}, |02,cc{C1}... já é muito forte... você poderia ser um...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}movasse até aqui até aqui, |02,cc{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}{Color:32}espere{Color:33} aqui, |02,cc{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:33}|02,cc{C1}! acabe com aquele inimigo!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:33}|02,cc{C1}, chege perto do inimigo e {Color:32}lute{Color:33}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}você é bom em batalhas, |02,cc{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:34}ah, desculpa! eu não me apresentei a você! meu nome é {Color:32}Oichi{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}eu estive em uma jornada com {Color:32}Jigglypuff{Color:33} por aqui...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:33}M-mas...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:33}Umm, mas se você não se importar...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:33}eu gostaria de me juntar a você, |02,cc{C1}! você me aceitaria como uma guerreira?{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}sim.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}nâo.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:33}por favor não seja tão cruel...{Wait:30}20 você vai deiar nâo é?{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:33}eu decidi que vái ser você a quem eu vou servir, |02,cc{C1}! por favor!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:33}eu não irei me unir a outro lorde! Por favor!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:32}é com você com quem euquero trabalhar, |02,cc{C1}...{Wait:30}20 {C1}Please...{Wait:30}20 por favor, deixe me unir a você!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:32}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:32}ah,eu entendo.{Wait:30}20 se você não quer deixar...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:33}na verdade não,! eu nâo vou desistir, |02,cc{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:33}por favor!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}O-obrigada!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}como uma guerreira , eu lhe darei meus servicos . {End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:32}{Wait:30}20But it is a worry...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:32}parece que as chamas de conflito chegaram a {Color:31}Aurora{Color:33} tambem...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}a {Color:34}região de ransei{Color:33}...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}uma area habitada por {Color:34}guerreiros{Color:33}, aqueles que tem o dom de falar com {Color:34}Pokémons{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}em{Color:34}Ransei{Color:33}, este uma lenda, passada de geraçao em geraçao:{End}

{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}se algum lorde conseguir unir todos os 17 reinos de {Color:34}Ransei{Color:33}, entâo o {Color:34}Pokémon{Color:33} que criou {Color:34}Ransei{Color:33} irá se mostrar.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}os {Color:34}guerreiros{Color:33} de todos os cantos, acreditam nisso , e é o que os motiva.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}e os resultados, inumeras {Color:34}batalhas{Color:33} são feitas para a posse dos reinos de {Color:34}Ransei{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}|02,cc{C1}, se nós vamos defendero reino de {Color:31}Aurora{Color:33}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}então {Color:31}Jigglypuff{Color:33} e eu,iremos ficar muito fortes!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}mas primeiro, vamos dár uma olhada no reino de {Color:31}Aurora{Color:33}!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}selecone ⅙ abaixo ⅖ para salvar seu jogo.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Você pode até salvar durante os treinos e as batalhas.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}|02,cc{C1}, tem um...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}ah!{End}
{C1}{Char:0034}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}com licença,você está no meu caminho.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:32}Desculpe-me...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}tem uma {Color:32}Fazenda{Color:33} nâo muito longe daqui, |02,cc{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}tenho certeza que tem pokemons selvagens por lá...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}vamos treinar um pouco!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}você é o lorde desse reino, |02,cc{C1}. {Color:31}Jigglypuff{Color:33} e eu , iremos seguir suas ordens!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}então, o que você quer que façamos?{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}os pokemons aliados podem ser movidos da mesma maneira de {Color:31}Eevee{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}tente trabalhar em equipe para chegar a vitoria!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}certo, {Color:31}Jigglypuff{Color:33}. vamos dár tudo de nós a |02,cc{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Do you know what {Color:32}Abilities{Color:33} are, |02,cc{C1}?{End}

{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{Color:31}Eevee{Color:33} has one called {Color:32}Celebrate{Color:33}... And {Color:31}Jigglypuff{Color:33} has one called {Color:32}Lullaby{Color:33}...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{Color:32}Abilities{Color:33} are something each Pokémon has.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}They are automatically activated during battle when certain conditions are met.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}You can view the {Color:32}Abilities{Color:33} that each Pokémon has by selecting ⅗ under ⅖.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}{Color:31}Eevee{Color:33} and {Color:31}Jigglypuff{Color:33} are both looking a bit stronger, aren't they?!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}Oh dear... We lost.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Well, never mind. There's always next time...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}The bond between a Warrior and their Pokémon is known as a {Color:32}link{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}The more time they spend together, the stronger this {Color:32}link{Color:33} becomes.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}This will make the Pokémon more powerful as well.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}You and {Color:31}Eevee{Color:33} must be tired after that battle, |02,cc{C1}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:32}And {Color:31}Jigglypuff{Color:33} is looking pretty worn out, too.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}I think we should take a little break.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}A Warrior can only do battle with their Pokémon or take them to visit a location once in a month.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}When all the Warriors in your army have moved, select ⅘ to advance to the next month.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:33}{Color:30}Koroku{Color:33} and his lot! Useless!{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:33}Losing against a complete beginner like that... They need to get their act together!{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:33}I'm not letting them mess things up for me now!{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:33}I've got to make the kingdom of {Color:31}Aurora{Color:33} mine!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}...!{Wait:30}20 Look, |02,cc{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}That place looks like it'd be full of wild Pokémon!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}It might be a good idea to do a little training.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}Look, |02,cc{C1}, over there...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}It's a {Color:32}Wooper{Color:33}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}If I recall correctly, {Color:32}Woopers{Color:33} have the {Color:32}Water Gun{Color:33} move.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Some moves, like {Color:32}Water Gun{Color:33}, allow you to attack a wide area.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Each Pokémon has a set move that they can use, so be sure to think about your tactics before entering battle!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:32}Are you all right, {Poke}{C1}?{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:32}Are you all right, {Color:31}Jigglypuff{Color:33}?{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}|02,cc{C1}, at times like this you should select the {Color:32}Warrior{Color:33} option.{End}

{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}You see, battles aren't just about telling your Pokémon where to move and when to fight. \p {C1}It's a Warrior's job to help out their Pokémon on the battlefield.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}My Warrior Skill is {Color:32}Sweet Song{Color:33}. It can be really helpful when you're in a bind.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Warriors can help their Pokémon in battle by using their various {Color:32}Warrior Skills{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{Color:32}Warrior Skills{Color:33} can only be used once each in every battle or training session.{End}
{C1}{Char:0034}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}You there!{End}
{C1}{Char:0036}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}You're {Name}{C1}, right?{End}
{C1}{Char:0035}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:33}Hey! {Color:32}Mitsunari{Color:33}! {Color:32}Masanori{Color:33}! Leave them alone.{End}
{C1}{Char:0036}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Come on, {Color:32}Kiyomasa{Color:33}! We need to have a word with these guys, or they won't know what they're doing!{End}
{C1}{Char:0034}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Yeah... We hear that you're training your Pokémon a lot...{End}
{C1}{Char:0034}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}But what for? What can you two hope to achieve?{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}I-I...!{End}
{C1}{Char:0035}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Well, they're right, you know.{End}
{C1}{Char:0035}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}You have to do more than just train. Eventually, you need to challenge another kingdom to a battle.{End}
{C1}{Char:0035}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}If you win that, you can get some more Warriors and Pokémon to join you.{End}
{C1}{Char:0034}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Strengthen your army, and win battles. Those are the tasks of a Warlord.{End}
{C1}{Char:0034}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}But I'm sure you know that much, right?{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}Uh... Well, I...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}|02,cc{C1}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}If we really want to become stronger, we're going to have to challenge other kingdoms to battle.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}I think the time has come for us to make our move.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Select the kingdom of {Color:30}Ignis{Color:33} to challenge their army to a battle.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}The Kingdom of {Color:30}Ignis{Color:33}{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:33}Hm?{Wait:30}20 You're...the Warlord of {Color:31}Aurora{Color:33}?!{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:33}I never thought I'd see you over here...{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:33}Well, two can play at that game! If it's a battle you want, I'm ready!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}Fine! Then a battle it is! But |02,cc{C1} is going to win!{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}Ho ho! Aren't you a cutie? I could do with someone like you in my army...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}Don't call me “cutie”!{Wait:30}20 I would never fight for someone like you, anyway!{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:34}Heh...{Wait:30}20 Don't be so hasty...{Wait:30}20 Once you see me in action, you might change your mind.{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:33}All right!{Wait:30}20 I think it's time for battle, don't you?{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:33}You again?{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:33}Do you really want a repeat of last time? You won't beat me, you know!{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:33}...I guess you're welcome to try, though!{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:33}This is the battlefield of {Color:30}Ignis{Color:33}! Pretty impressive, huh?{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:33}The {Color:32}pillars of fire{Color:33} and the {Color:32}magma{Color:33} will stop you from getting near me...{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}But my {Color:30}Chimchar{Color:33} isn't bothered by things like that!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}|02,cc{C1}!{Wait:30}20 Look...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}...It seems there are times when the {Color:32}pillars of fire{Color:33} disappear.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{Color:31}Eevee{Color:33} and {Color:31}Jigglypuff{Color:33} can move across the area safely then.{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:33}I've got big ambitions, you know! {Color:30}Ignis{Color:33} is just the beginning for me!{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:33}Before long, all the kingdoms will be mine!{End}
{C1}{Char:0066}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}{Color:30}Bidoof{Color:33} can't go into the {Color:32}magma{Color:33}... He's useless!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}H-How can you say that about your own partner?!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}The {Color:32}pillars of fire{Color:33} occasionally disappear.{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:33}My castle! How could I lose it...?{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:33}But I have made a vow! I will be the one to find the legendary Pokémon!{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:33}And that means I will be back!{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}Ha! That's how I roll!{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Now, I hope you learned your lesson. Bye bye!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}Congratulations, |02,cc{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Your second castle... I'm sure we'll start making allies before long.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}The only thing is...I don't know how...{End}
{C1}{Char:0033}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}I don't believe it! You went into battle without knowing stuff like that?!{End}
{C1}{Char:0000}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}...?!{End}
{C1}{Char:0033}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}I watched your battle in {Color:31}Ignis{Color:33}. You're impressive for one so young!{End}
{C1}{Char:0033}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}But if you don't even know how to make allies...{End}
